text: Sultan Kösen (born 10 December 1982 in Ankara, Turkey) is the tallest man in the world after passing the height of Xi Shun. He also holds the record for the world's biggest hands (27.05 cm). On February 9, 2019 he was measured again by Guinness and was named as the tallest person in the world. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish people
title: Sultan Kösen
